message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 35
RNNs 7 [10]
Training is more costly
the training of a RNN is computationally demanding
consider a list or time series of 10K elements 
standard backpropagation would require 10,000 time steps for each of 
the forward and backward passes for each and every parameter 
update
in practice, truncated backpropagation is used
it splits the forward and backward passes into a set of smaller 
forward/backward pass operations
35
speaker: SYSTEM
